title: DigiTwin Inbox
description: HiveOT digital twin inbox action storage

inboxRecord.title: Inbox Record
inboxRecord.description: Record of action request and delivery progress

delivered.title: Delivered Timestamp
delivered.description: DateTime in RFC3339milli the action was delivered to the device agent

error.description: Error if the request could not be completed

input.title: Action Input
input.comment: there is no type as it can by anything

messageID.description: Message ID linking requests and delivery updates

received.title: Received Timestamp
received.description: DateTime in RFC3339milli the action was received by the inbox

senderID.description: Connection ID of the sender. Used to send delivery updates.

thingID.description: Digitwin Thing ID the action is directed at

timestamp.title: Timestamp of creation
timestamp.description: Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch this record was created

updated.title: Updated Timestamp
updated.description: DateTime in RFC3339milli the delivery status was last updated

readLatest.title: Read Latest
readLatest.description: Read the latest Thing action record from the inbox

thingID.title: Thing ID
thingID.description: ID of the Thing to read
